question.text: You are on a busy main road and find that you are travelling in the wrong direction. What should you do?

explanation.text: Don’t turn round in a busy street or reverse from a side road into a main road. Find a quiet side road and choose a place where you won’t obstruct an entrance or exit. Look out for pedestrians and cyclists as well as other traffic.

answer.text: Turn into a side road on the right and reverse into the main road
Make a U-turn in the main road
Make a ‘three-point’ turn in the main road
Turn round in a side road
